## MovableLimit type

The limit within which node can be moved

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MovableLimit = {
    parent?: HTMLElement;
    delta?: {
        x: MovableLimitDelta;
        y: MovableLimitDelta;
    } | MovableLimitDelta;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [MovableLimitDelta](./svelte-movable.movablelimitdelta.md)
